altTitles.en: Yell for the Blue Sky

altTitles.th: กู่เสียงฝันให้ก้องฟ้า

altTitles.ja: 青空エール

description.en: Aozora Yell centers on Tsubasa, a girl who saw an inspirational brass band performance at the finals of the Japanese high school baseball championships one summer. Tsubasa vows to join the band when she enters high school, and she happens to meet a certain boy there.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Tsubasa, que viu uma apresentação de uma banda de metais nas finais do campeonato Japonês de beisebol em um verão. Tsubasa promete se juntar a banda quando entrar no colegial, e acontece dela conhecer um garoto que tem objetivos parecidos com os dela e os dois se esforçam para realizar seus sonhos.

altTitles.ja: オトメの帝国

altTitles.en: Virgins' Empire

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.
description.ja: かわいくって好奇心旺盛　やかましいけど憎めない　欲望に忠実なイマドキteenたちの不思議な生態を覗き見しちゃう!?

altTitles.ja: 忍者パパ

description.en: Nobu, a 32 year old salary man, is spreading justice from the shadows as a ninja while maintaining his family and working at his company. What he doesn't know is that he is being followed by mysterious persons and his gifted family. Can he put everything in order?

altTitles.en: Oriko the Giant

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントお嬢様

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

altTitles.en: Kanata of the Darkness

altTitles.ja: 幽闇のカナタ

description.en: The presence of 'it' can be felt everywhere. Kanata, a woman who lost her sense of fear after a certain incident, searches for moments that freeze her heart as she follows the traces of 'it'...!? In parks, on emergency staircases, and in the cracks between walls, people who accidentally draw close to the presence of 'it' experience indescribable terror, leaving their everyday lives irreparably changed. After all, ghosts really are the scariest...

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: フォロワーが彼女になりました

altTitles.pt-br: Minha seguidora é a minha namorada

description.en:
It is now Reiwa, a new era marked by the spread of the novel corona virus.
Two university freshmen had lost their chance of having romantic encounters because their classes were almost immediately moved online after starting university.
They are Takano Shouhei (SNS ID: Mega Donki), a virgin aiming for ten thousand likes on his SNS posts and Sasakura Nene (SNS ID: nene), a thickheaded convenience store part-timer and they have somehow become each other’s purpose for living.
This is the start of a miracle-like pure love comedy that started on social media.
description.pt-br: Na era Reiwa, um novo vírus é amplamente espalhado. Calouros da faculdade repentinamente são obrigados a participar de aulas a distância e perderam sua oportunidade de se apaixonar. Takano Shohei (Nickname: Super Arma Branca), um menino virgem que tem como objetivo obter mais seguidores e Sasakura Nene (Nickname: Nene), uma garota vazia que trabalha em uma loja de conveniência por milagre se encontram por conta de redes sociais, e dão um ao outro a esperança necessária para continuar vivendo. Uma comédia romântica!

title.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady

altTitles.zh: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

altTitles.zh-ro: Èmó nǚpū zhǐ xiǎng bèi è yì qiānjīn qīfù

altTitles.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

altTitles.ja: 魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

altTitles.ja: セクシャル・ハンター・ライオット

description.en: The Kirionira are the demons that live in another dimension and invade the human world through their dreams. The only defense humanity has against the demonic assault are the hunters who rely on their sex drive as a source of power to fight against them. Riku Yoichi came from a long line of hunters and had high amounts of sexual energy which allowed him to be a great hunter. He moved away from his home town after middle school to demolish the Kirionira and was successful in finishing off the king and ending the battle forever. However, the peace came at the price of Yoichi losing his sex mojo. Returning back to his home town, he soon learns that the demon invasion was not over, but without his sex drive, he is helpless to fight back. He tries convincing his childhood friend Namba Midori and her female classmates to get him sexually aroused, but they want nothing to do with it.

altTitles.en: TBATE

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: アマチュアビジランテ

description.en: Action thriller about an obsessed lonely man with a delusional plot to save Japan by assassinating a politician. But his twisted plan is disturbed when he witnesses a young girl next door getting abducted by the Yakuza. He decides to save her but his attempt ends in a chaotic massacre where he manages to kill the gangsters. But things only get worse from here on out, now he's getting hunted down by even more ruthless killers.
description.ja: 尾城慎太郎39歳。低学歴、低収入、いわゆる低級国民。失い、奪われ続けた男は、社会から断絶し孤独と絶望の果てに、政治家の暗殺を決意した‥‥。

description.en: A new slapstick comedy series by Arawi Keiichi, author of Nichijou.    The manga centers on Nagumo, a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people.  The original run was 13 volumes, ending with chapter 186 in Feb 2021.  Serialization was resumed in Dec 2024 for the upcoming anime..  [Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: A Girl Who Sees Through The Kindness That Derives From Sexual Desire

altTitles.ja: 性欲由来の優しさ見抜き女子

altTitles.ja-ro: Seiyoku Yurai no Yasashisa Minuki Joshi

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.en: SSS-Class Suicide Hunter

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

altTitles.en: SSSCSH

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS%E7%B4%9A%E6%AD%BB%E8%80%8C%E5%BE%A9%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%B5%E4%BA%BA/96)

title.en: A Corporate Underling Who Excels at Work

description.en:
Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis,
once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.
But then, a "Mysterious Benefactor" steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...
"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"
In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: ガチ恋魔王様

description.en: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
description.pt-br: Um herói assume a tarefa de derrotar o Rei Demônio pelo bem da paz mundial. Quando ele chega ao castelo da Maou, ele é saudado pela Maou com uma certidão de casamento na mão! O herói fica perplexo com o forte apelo da Maou para se casar com ele, mas…? Uma comédia de amor sobre uma Maou amorosa e um herói amargurado cujo mundo está em perigo de extinção!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: めしぬま。

description.en: Iinuma, a somewhat dull salaryman, eats food as his craving drives him! This is an appetite-stimulating gourmet manga where you can just watch him eating his food!
description.vi: Truyện xoay quanh một anh chàng nhân viên văn phòng có vẻ ngoài nhạt nhẽo tên Iinuma với tâm hồn ăn uống, luôn nghĩ đến chuyện măm măm cơm. Iinuma có phần Kanji của chữ “Ii” là 飯 - cũng có thể đọc là “meshi”, trong tiếng Nhật có nghĩa là cơm hoặc thịt. Mọi chuyện tưởng như không có gì để bàn tới nhưng đợi đã, xem biểu cảm khuôn mặt thỏa mãn chạm nóc vì thưởng thức món ngon của cậu ta kìa, có gì đó sao mà… lạ lắm à nghen! Cậu đang… ăn thôi đúng không!?

altTitles.en: Duke's Private Tutor

description.en: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

title.en: Tsuihou sareta Renkinjutsushi, Adaruto Guzzu de Sekai wo Sukuu ~ Donna Monsutaa mo Zettai ni Ikaseru Otoko ~

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師、アダルトグッズで世界を救う ～どんなモンスターも絶対にイカせる男～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Saves the World with Adult Toys – A Man Who Can Make Any Monster Orgasm Without Fail

description.en:
**You’ve been making... nothing but adult toys?!**

Oruga Zumu, a man whose alchemy always turns everything into adult toys, is expelled from his party for **lowering the status.** However, the female knight Kuu Korosse, who appears before him, recognizes Oruga’s true power.

Thus begins the ¨**Sex War of The End,** where Oruga sets out to slay lustful monsters and save the world.
description.ja: 「おまえが作ってきたのは…全部アダルトグッズじゃないか！」錬金するものがすべて“アダルトグッズ”になってしまうオルガ＝ズムは、「俺たちの格が下がる」という理由でパーティーを追放されてしまう。だが、そこに現れた女騎士クゥ＝コロッセはオルガの本当の力を見抜いていた。性欲モンスターを討ち滅ぼし世界を救う”終焉の性戦”が、ここに幕を開く——。

title.en: Boku to Gal ga Fufu ni Narumade

altTitles.ja: 僕と君が夫婦になるまで

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku to Gal ga Fuufu ni Naru made

altTitles.en: Until the Gal and I Become a Married Couple

altTitles.ru: Пока мы с девушкой не станем супружеской парой

description.en: Saku Kanakura was a boy born into a poor household. He studied hard and managed to pass the exam to an excellent high school but, it soon turned out that his parents were in debt! When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—
description.id: Saku Kanakura adalah anak laki-laki yang lahir dari keluarga miskin. Dia belajar dengan giat dan berhasil lulus ujian ke sekolah menengah yang bagus, tetapi ternyata orang tuanya terlilit hutang! Ketika tiba waktunya untuk melunasi hutang, seorang gadis misterius muncul dan menawarkan untuk melunasi hutang mereka. Sebuah beban besar hampir terlepas dari kepala Kanakura, tetapi gadis itu membuat syarat sebagai balasannya yang menyatakan bahwa—
description.ja: 貧乏な家庭に育った少年・神長倉颯空。猛勉強の甲斐あって見事希望する高校へ合格した彼だったが、両親の借金が判明！ 借金を取り立てられていたところ、謎のギャルが現れてそれらを返済してくれることに！ 窮地を脱した神長倉だったが、ギャルが借金を肩代わりする際に彼に出した条件は――。

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens... danger emerges... from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

altTitles.ja: 居直り友達

altTitles.en: Sudden Friendship

description.en: When juvenile delinquent, Maika, trespasses into a home, she comes face to face with a bloodsoaked girl, Uta... Winner of the Inaugural Action-Monthly Manga Competition.

title.en: When You're Seated Next To The Girl You Have a Crush On

altTitles.ja: 片想い中の女子と隣の座席になったら・・・

description.ja:
校外学習から帰るバスの中、片想い中の戸崎さんと隣の座席になったが戸崎さんは寝てしまう。
そんな中、友達は僕に戸崎さんのことが好きだから、隣の席でよかったな！
と言ってくるが、戸崎さんは実は起きていて…

altTitles.ja: しゅごキャラ！ ジュエルジョーカー

description.en:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!

altTitles.ja: ときめけ魔法幼女ココピュア

altTitles.en: Heart-pounding Magical Girl Koko-pure

description.en: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.

title.en: Sasada wa Okane de Oshi wo Daku

altTitles.en: Sasada Embraces Her Oshi with the Power of Money

altTitles.ja: ササダはオカネで推しを抱く

description.en:
*"Come on...! You want this, don't you? Here comes the donation!" [Cha-ching~!]*

Sasada Natsuko — an otaku living the hopeless existence of a wage slave for an abusive company.

What saved her was a streamer with an animated avatar — a VTuber — called Amano Amao. Knowing Amao's propensity to be turned on by money, Sasada shows her love in the form of AkaSupas (pricey donations) night after night!

But Amao's past life (real life person) is actually hiding a secret...?

A woman who works for the sake of the oshi who saved her, and a man who isn't making progress despite being her oshi.

The *virtual* and the *real* — does this love have any hope for crossplay!?

title.en: Koi wa Ameagari no You ni

altTitles.en: After the Rain

altTitles.es: Amor es cuando cesa la lluvia

altTitles.ja: 恋は雨上がりのように

altTitles.en: Love Is Like After The Rain

description.en:
Akira Tachibana is a soft-spoken high school student who used to be a part of the track and field club but, due to an injury, she is no longer able to run as fast as she once could. Working part-time at a family restaurant as a recourse, she finds herself inexplicably falling love with her manager, a divorced 45-year-old man with a young son.  
  
Despite the age gap, Akira wholeheartedly embraces his mannerisms and kind nature, which is seen as spinelessness by the other employees, and little by little, the two begin to understand each other. Although unable to explain why exactly she is attracted to him, Akira believes that a concrete reason is not needed to truly love someone. On a rainy day, she decides to finally tell her manager about how she feels… But just how will he react?
description.pt-br: Tachibana, uma linda garota do colegial está apaixonada... Não é um simples amor, algo que talvez seja impossível. Ela está apaixonada pelo gerente de seu trabalho que é mais velho que ela. Agora ela irá desistir de seu amor e viver sua simples vida cotidiana de colegial ou conseguirá passar os seus sentimento a alguém tão diferente dela.

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend

altTitles.en: A Prince of a Friend
The Prince's Friend

altTitles.ja: 学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.ja: 恋する２DK、あやかし前妻憑き。

altTitles.en: For Rent: A Loving 2DK Apartment, Ex-Wife Haunting Included

description.en: After being cheated on by her fiancé and being driven out of her home, Ookami Tsukasa realizes that romance is a trauma for her now. Loveless, homeless, and drowning herself in alcohol daily, she moves to a run-down apartment and meets the neighborhood heartthrob Isato Haruyuki. Could this be a sign of romance to come...!? Unfortunately, she ends up being haunted by Isato’s ex-wife!
description.ja:
「もう男という生き物が信じられない…」

婚約者に浮気された挙句家を追い出され、恋愛にトラウマを抱える限界OL・大上つかさ。恋人も家も失いヤケ酒に溺れる日々の中、引っ越してきたボロアパートで近所でも有名なイケメン・伊里 春幸に出会う。新たな恋の予感…!? だが、このアパートには伊里の“前妻”がとり憑いているようで――!?

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

altTitles.en: Yuru Yuri

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.ja: 旧・茶道部の部室を不法占拠して勝手に「ごらくぶ」の活動を続ける、悪の4人組。正義の生徒会は、ならず者どもを一掃するためについに重い腰を上げたのだった…という展開ははっきり言って全くない、まったりコミック第1巻が登場。愛が溢れまくりで、明日からも元気に生きて行けること請け合い。よ～し、パパ二度寝しちゃうぞ～!!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

altTitles.en: My Deer Friend Nokotan

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の騎士は、必ず死ぬヒロインを救うため異世界でも最強の騎士となる ～両手に花を、両手に剣を～

altTitles.en: The Strongest Knight in the World, in an Attempt to Save the Heroines Who Were Destined to Die, Decided to Become the Strongest in Another World as Well: Flowers in Both Hands, Swords in Both Hands

altTitles.zh: 现实世界最强的骑士，为了拯救注定会死去的女主角

description.en:
A young boy named Mikazuki Kenya was abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude. At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming. A meeting with Kaguya and Reina, the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant. The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them. 

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die.

To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!
description.ja:
ガチ恋したヒロインを救うため運命を覆せ！

両親に捨てられ、高校では虐められ、孤独となった少年・御剣剣也。絶望の淵に居た時、唯一の趣味であるVRゲームで運命の出会いを果たす。それは、大人気ゲーム『Knight of Giant』のヒロイン「かぐや」と「レイナ」。二人のヒロインと過ごす時間が彼を救い、二人ともにガチ恋した。しかし、彼女たちはストーリーの中でどちらかが必ず死ぬ運命・・・そんな運命を変えるため、世界最強となるまで人生を捧げてゲームを極めた末に、突如、剣也は『Knight of Giant』の世界に入り込んでしまう――!?

altTitles.en: I Regressed As The Duke

description.en:
Consumed by the flames of a burning castle, an aged butler is reincarnated as the younger version of his incompetent master, Duke Aaron of Brahn. 

Suddenly finding himself in a position of real power, equipped with his past expertise in estate management, the “new” duke sets out to rule Brahn the “right” way. Will the young Duke Aaron be able to save Brahn and its people from destruction at the hands of his uncle, the evil Emperor Zeron? 

How will he balance being an effective leader with the ruthlessness required to survive? Only time will tell!
description.ko:
위대한 황제 글라인의 아들이자
'드래곤의 가호'를 받은 황태자 '아론'.
하지만 숙부인 '제론'의 반란으로
제국의 변방 '브란 영지'로 쫓겨나게 된다.
​
"제론 황제가 우릴 다 죽일 거야..."
​
복수도, 황위도 잊으라는 아버지의 유언을 지키며
척박한 영지의 공작으로 무력하게 살아가던 어느 날,
제론 황제는 브란 영지를 침공한다!
그가 원하는 건 아론의 목숨뿐만이 아니었다.
​
브란 영지의 소멸!
​
제론 황제가 퍼붓는 화염 속으로 사라져 버리는
아론 공작과 브란 영지를 지켜보던 충신 ‘가일’도
결국 재가 되어 사라졌다.
​
아니, 그런 줄 알았다!
​
다시 눈을 떴을 때,
젊은 날의 아론 공작이 된 자신을 발견한 가일!
​
"공작님처럼 힘을 숨기며 살진 않겠어!"
​
수단과 방법을 가리지 않고 영지를 발전시켜
20년 후에 닥칠 제론 황제의 침공에 대비하고,
빼앗긴 황제의 자리를 되찾기로 결심한다!
​
"제론 황제! 후회하게 해주마!"

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rt_xS0sCU4U)
description.pt-br:
O filho do grande imperador Gline, Príncipe “Aaron”, é o recipiente da “Bênção do Dragão”. Mas por causa da rebelião liderada por seu tio, “Zerone”, ele foi banido para os arredores do reino, ‘Campos Brahn’.“O Imperador Zerone vai matar todos nós…”

Mantendo o desejo de seu pai de esquecer a coroa e a vingança, Aaron estava vivendo impotente como o duque de uma terra morta… mas um dia, o Imperador Zerone invadiu os Campos Brahn!Seu objetivo era destruir os Campos Brahn!

Até mesmo o súdito leal, “Gayle”, virou cinzas enquanto observava Duque Aaron e os Campos Brahn desaparecerem no meio das chamas do Imperador Zerone.Pelo menos foi o que achamos que aconteceu!Quando abriu os olhos, Gayle se viu na posição de um jovem príncipe Aaron!

“Eu não vou viver enquanto escondo meu poder como o Duque fez!”Usando todos os meios necessários para desenvolver a terra e se preparando para a invasão do Imperador Zerone que acontecerá daqui a 20 anos, ele decide retomar o lugar do Imperador que foi roubado!

title.en: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu

altTitles.ja: 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです

altTitles.en: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless

altTitles.ko: 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다

altTitles.zh: 只有无职是不会辞去的

altTitles.zh-hk: 只有無職是不會辭去的

description.en:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
description.ja: 就活中に事故で死にそうになった楠一之丞は異世界に転移。さらに女神の手違いにより一之丞は常人の400倍のスピードで成長する能力を授かった。あまりの成長速度に、一之丞は無職のまま異世界生活を始める。

title.en: Gate 0: Jieitai Ginzai Nite Kaku Tatakaeri

altTitles.ja: ゲート０ -zero-　自衛隊　銀座にて、斯く戦えり

altTitles.en: Gate 0 -ZERO- The Self-Defense Forces fought like this in Ginza

altTitles.ru: Врата 0: Сражение Сил самообороны в Гинзе.

description.en: In the summer of 20XX, a "gate to another world"' suddenly appeared in Ginza, Tokyo. What came pouring in from inside was a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone was helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there was one man who was brave enough to move around. That man was Youji Itami, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
description.ja: 20××年の夏、東京銀座に突如「異世界への門」が出現した。中から雪崩れ込んできたのは、謎の軍勢と醜悪な怪異の群れ。彼らは人々を殺戮して回り、白昼の銀座はたちまち地獄絵図と化した。この非常事態に誰もがなすすべなく混乱に陥る中、ひとりだけ果敢に動き回る男がいた。その男こそのちに「二重橋の英雄」と呼ばれることとなる、オタク自衛官の伊丹耀司だった――！
description.ru: Летом 20ХХ года в Гинзе, квартале Токио, внезапно появились «Врата в иной мир». Из них разразились таинственная армия и полчища диковинных уродливых монстров. Они нахлынули и устроили бойню, и Гинза средь бела дня мгновенно обратилась адом. И пока в панике все растерянно метались посреди этой чрезвычайной ситуации, лишь одному мужчине хватило храбрости действовать. Им оказался Итами Йоджи, отаку из Сил самообороны, которого впоследствии назовут «Героем Нидзюбаси»! Безумно популярная серия фэнтези «Другой мир против Сил самообороны», история появления врат, «Инцидент в Гинзе», теперь в формате манги!!!

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.en: Let's Manage the Tower

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.en: Honey Blood

altTitles.ja: ハニーブラッド

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House Is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living There I Become the Strongest in the World

description.en:
Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
___
**Storyboarder:** [Oomine](https://mangadex.org/author/3a2b2fed-9cc9-4538-b2ca-1d563370316f)
**Character Designer:** [Nabeshima Tetsuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/9badc86b-f0ba-4f08-bc11-323ea16aae00)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/34698)
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

altTitles.en: Ultimate Exorcist Kiyoshi

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!
